Create three 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
Cycling {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor:
"All are not equal—neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity."
—Senifet, vizier of Bontu
cards.name: Supernatural Stamina
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

cards.flavor: Even in the relative safety of the city, there are places best left undisturbed.
cards.name: Trespasser's Curse
cards.text:
Enchant player
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under enchanted player's control, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Trial of Ambition
cards.text:
When Trial of Ambition enters the battlefield, target opponent sacrifices a creature.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Ambition to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"Ambition requires clarity. If you have any doubts, they must be abandoned."
—Bontu, god of ambition
cards.name: Unburden
cards.text:
Target player discards two cards.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: Forever restless. Forever growing in number.
cards.name: Wander in Death
cards.text:
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: All but the gods fear the scorpion's sting.
cards.name: Wasteland Scorpion
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor:
"Hesitation breeds dissension. To be worthy of the next life, you must never look back."
—Anep, vizier of Hazoret
cards.name: Ahn-Crop Crasher
cards.text:
Haste
You may exert Ahn-Crop Crasher as it attacks. When you do, target creature can't block this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.name: Battlefield Scavenger
cards.text:
You may exert Battlefield Scavenger as it attacks. (It won't untap during your next untap step.)
Whenever you exert a creature, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

cards.flavor: The arrows fell like fiery rain, and for a moment, the sky itself seemed to burn.
cards.name: Blazing Volley
cards.text: Blazing Volley deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.

cards.flavor: "To victory! To glory! To eternity!"
cards.name: Bloodlust Inciter
cards.text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: To Hazoret, those who fight for her are her beloved children.
cards.name: Bloodrage Brawler
cards.text: When Bloodrage Brawler enters the battlefield, discard a card.

cards.flavor: "Oketra had our crop build an obelisk to prove the power of working together. But I am stronger without the weak."
cards.name: Brute Strength
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Dissent? Your gods can't even begin to comprehend the dissent that's about to happen here!"
—Chandra Nalaar
cards.name: By Force
cards.text: Destroy X target artifacts.

cards.flavor: The fifth cartouche is the final affirmation of glory, granted only to the worthy dead.
cards.name: Cartouche of Zeal
cards.text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Zeal enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.

cards.name: Combat Celebrant
cards.text: If Combat Celebrant hasn't been exerted this turn, you may exert it as it attacks. When you do, untap all other creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor: Headlong is the only way to pass through the gate to the afterlife.
cards.name: Consuming Fervor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has "At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on this creature."

cards.name: Deem Worthy
cards.text:
Deem Worthy deals 7 damage to target creature.
Cycling {3}{R} ({3}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Deem Worthy, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor: The endless expanse of desert surrounding Naktamun sometimes yields threats that the gods themselves must answer.
cards.name: Desert Cerodon
cards.text: Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: "Some hid from the storm. I embraced it and learned its name."
cards.name: Electrify
cards.text: Electrify deals 4 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor: "My stride will break only against the twin points of Hazoret's spear."
cards.name: Emberhorn Minotaur
cards.text: You may exert Emberhorn Minotaur as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor:
"Allow zealous flames to light your path and the glory you seek will be revealed."
—Hazoret, god of zeal
cards.name: Flameblade Adept
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Flameblade Adept gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Never flinch. Never falter. Never fear.
cards.name: Fling
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

cards.name: Glorious End
cards.text:
End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities on the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)
At the beginning of your next end step, you lose the game.

cards.flavor: What the initiates face in the final trial is completely at Hazoret's discretion.
cards.name: Glorybringer
cards.text:
Flying, haste
You may exert Glorybringer as it attacks. When you do, it deals 4 damage to target non-Dragon creature an opponent controls. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor: "Fight through it."
cards.name: Harsh Mentor
cards.text: Whenever an opponent activates an ability of an artifact, creature, or land on the battlefield, if it isn't a mana ability, Harsh Mentor deals 2 damage to that player.

cards.name: Hazoret the Fervent
cards.text:
Indestructible, haste
Hazoret the Fervent can't attack or block unless you have one or fewer cards in hand.
{2}{R}, Discard a card: Hazoret deals 2 damage to each opponent.

cards.flavor: Hazoret's gift is bestowed only once.
cards.name: Hazoret's Favor
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Heart-Piercer Manticore
cards.text:
When Heart-Piercer Manticore enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. When you do, Heart-Piercer Manticore deals damage equal to that creature's power to any target.

cards.flavor: With carrion a rarity in the Broken Lands, the hyenas that stalk the deserts hunt in packs.

cards.flavor:
"When the time comes, only one of you will be honored by my spear."
—Hazoret, god of zeal

cards.text:
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Ashes can't be embalmed."
—Neheb, initiate of Ahn crop
cards.name: Magma Spray
cards.text: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: In the training ground known as the Gauntlet, initiates are pushed to practice more destructive techniques.

cards.text: When Manticore of the Gauntlet enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature you control. Manticore of the Gauntlet deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: "Those wings are no advantage. I will pin them to the ceiling of the Hekma."
cards.name: Minotaur Sureshot
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{1}{R}: Minotaur Sureshot gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "If you do not feel the thrill of battle, alive like a flame, you will never triumph."
cards.name: Nef-Crop Entangler
cards.text:
Trample
You may exert Nef-Crop Entangler as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+2 until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor:
"In the Hour of Glory, the gods and the untested will prove their worth before the God-Pharaoh."
—The Accounting of Hours
cards.name: Nimble-Blade Khenra
cards.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

cards.flavor: "The expected way through the trial is far too tedious."

cards.text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor:
"Combat is a form of worship, the clash of steel a solemn prayer."

cards.text:
Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

Prowess

cards.text:
Sweltering Suns deals 3 damage to each creature.

cards.flavor: The sound of its plated tail beating on desert rocks is often mistaken for the footfalls of a much larger predator.
cards.name: Thresher Lizard
cards.text: Thresher Lizard gets +1/+2 as long as you have one or fewer cards in hand.

cards.flavor: "You are undeserving of the afterlife. You will never feel the God-Pharaoh's embrace."
cards.name: Tormenting Voice
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

cards.flavor: "Eternal glory awaits you, my child."
cards.name: Trial of Zeal
cards.text:
When Trial of Zeal enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: Shoulder to shoulder until blade must turn against blade.

cards.text:
You may exert Trueheart Twins as it attacks. (It won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.text: When Warfire Javelineer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: It falls to the gods to help all become worthy of the afterlife.

cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or an enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

cards.flavor: "The vizier of poisons teaches an unconventional kind of strength."

cards.text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Strength enters the battlefield, you may have enchanted creature fight target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.flavor: The only way to finish the Trial of Strength is with a basilisk scale in hand.
cards.name: Champion of Rhonas
cards.text: You may exert Champion of Rhonas as it attacks. When you do, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.text:
When Channeler Initiate enters the battlefield, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature you control.
{T}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Channeler Initiate: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor:
"If it is bigger, you must be faster. If it is stronger, you must be sharper. Anything less, and you will never seize a place in our God-Pharaoh's perfect afterlife."
—Rhonas, god of strength

cards.flavor:
"Everything in the trial has teeth. You will overcome them, or you will feed them."
—Rhonas, god of strength

Haste

Enchant land

cards.text: Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. Remove all -1/-1 counters from it. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.flavor: A true reflection of nature: death fostering life.

cards.text: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control, and put those cards onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

cards.flavor:
"Rely too much on your weapons and watch your dreams shatter in your hands."
—Rhonas, god of strength

cards.text:
When Manglehorn enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.
Artifacts your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: "The lands of the God-Pharaoh are suffused with his breath."
cards.name: Naga Vitalist

cards.flavor: "Like fruits in the field, we will be harvested when the season is right."

cards.flavor: Debate rages among the viziers whether comparing the kudu's horns to the God-Pharaoh's is blasphemy or reverence.
cards.name: Ornery Kudu
cards.text: When Ornery Kudu enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature you control.

cards.flavor: They labor beside the anointed, constructing the vast monuments of Naktamun.

cards.text:
Deathtouch, indestructible

Creatures with flying can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

cards.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You may remove a -1/-1 counter from it.
